overview:
Andy Page brings more than 20 years of experience to his role at Gilt Groupe. As Chief Financial Officer and Head of Operations, Andy oversees all of the company’s financial operations, distribution, corporate strategic planning and Gilt City.

Prior to joining Gilt, Andy was COO and CFO at PlayPhone Inc., where he was GM of North America and responsible for managing the company’s financial and engineering organizations across 15 countries. Before PlayPhone, Andy was CFO and SVP of Business Strategy at StubHub Inc., where he managed the company’s financial operations, business strategy and administrative functions. He also led the company’s sale to eBay in 2007. Andy has held senior executive positions at Panasas Inc., ONI Systems Corp. and Robertson Stephens & Company.

Andy holds a bachelor of arts from Princeton University and an MBA from Harvard Business School. He is an advisor to several private e-commerce companies and serves on the board of directors of My New Red Shoes, a nonprofit organization that provides back-to-school clothes for homeless and low-income children in the San Francisco Bay Area.
